block_list.title: Video Tutorial
block_list.body: Ever thought of owning a Yacht? Learn how to fold one, really simple in this video. This is the Origami Yacht designed by Toshie Takahama. Less than a minute origami. As usual, Enjoy!!! Here at Heap Art, we are trying to help you practice origami on a regular bases. Every week I will select a minimum of 2 origami models and show you how to fold it. If you like origami and paper airplanes -- Please use the following link to subscribe to my channel: https://www.youtube.com/c/heapart?sub_confirmation=1 My Upload Schedule: Tuesday : A new Paper Airplane, part of my 100 Exotic Paper Airplane Challenge Friday : A new Origami Model never seen before on my channel

block_list.title: More Designs from Toshie Takahama
block_list.body:
• Cat by Toshie Takahama
  • Yacht by Toshie Takahama
